steps.text: Thaw 2 boxes frozen spinach in large bowl
Drain and dry spinach well, return to large bowl
Mince 1 large onion, add to spinach
Melt 1 stick butter and 1 stick margarine in small bowl in microwave
Add melted butter and margarine to spinach
Crack 4 eggs in small bowl and beat until mixed
Add 2 cups Pepperidge Farm stuffing mix to spinach
Add 1/2 tsp. pepper and 1/2 tsp. garlic salt to spinach
Add 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese to spinach
Form mixture into small balls on ungreased baking sheet
Bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes, until golden brown on top
